docs.title: Welcome to Your Documentation
docs.text: This is your homepage

docs.title: Skybender Technology Partners
docs.text: Welcome to Skybender Technology Partners, a multinational technology company specializing in innovative business applications, with operations in the United States and New Zealand.

docs.text: Skybender Technology Partners operates through two primary business entities to serve our global customer base:

docs.title: Business Operations
docs.text: Our multinational structure enables us to: - Operate seamlessly across multiple jurisdictions - Provide localized support in multiple regions - Comply with regional regulations and requirements - Serve a global customer base

docs.title: Regulatory Compliance
docs.text: We maintain compliance with regulations in all jurisdictions where we operate, including: - United States Federal and State Laws - New Zealand Companies Act and Regulations - Apple App Store Guidelines (Global) - International Data Protection Standards

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: The O'meter transforms your iPhone into an engaging, motion-controlled measuring device that adds a playful twist to any social situation. By cleverly utilizing your device's motion sensors, it creates an interactive experience that's perfect for entertainment and social activities.

docs.title: What Makes It Special
docs.text: The O'meter stands out with its intuitive tilt-based interface and versatile measurement modes. Whether you're rating a friend's joke, deciding where to eat, or breaking the ice at a party, The O'meter adds an element of fun to decision-making and social interactions.

docs.title: Motion-Controlled Interface
docs.text:
• Responsive needle movement based on device tilt
  • Smooth, physics-based animations
  • Adjustable sensitivity controls

docs.title: Multiple Measurement Modes
docs.text:
• Coolness Meter
  • Food Rating System
  • Skill Level Gauge
  • Magic 8-Ball Style Predictor
  • Truth Detector

docs.title: Customization Options
docs.text:
• Create custom labels for your own measurements
  • Adjust sensitivity settings
  • Enable/disable sound effects

docs.title: Perfect For
docs.text:
• Social gatherings and parties
  • Ice-breaking activities
  • Random decision making
  • Rating games
  • Adding fun to everyday moments

docs.title: Technical Details
docs.text:
• Requires iOS 15.0 or later
  • Compatible with iPhone
  • Uses built-in motion sensors
  • No internet connection required
  • No data collection or storage

docs.title: Development Story
docs.text: The O'meter was created by Skybender Technology Partners with the goal of bringing people together through playful interaction. Our team wanted to create something that could instantly make any situation more entertaining while being incredibly simple to use.

docs.title: Privacy & Data
docs.text: The O'meter is designed with privacy in mind: - No personal data collection - No network connectivity required - No analytics tracking - No user accounts needed

docs.title: Support
docs.text:
For support inquiries, contact: dave@skybendertechnologypartners.com

Note: The O'meter's measurements are for entertainment purposes only and should not be taken seriously. The app is designed purely for fun and social entertainment.

docs.title: Privacy Policy for The O'meter
docs.text: Last updated: December 5, 2024

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: This Privacy Policy explains how The O'meter app ("we", "our", or "us") collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our mobile application.

docs.title: Information We Don't Collect
docs.text: The O'meter is designed with privacy in mind. We do not collect, store, or share any personal information about our users. The app functions entirely on your device and does not: - Collect personal information - Track your location - Access your contacts or photos - Require any account creation - Send any data to external servers

docs.title: Device Permissions
docs.text:
The O'meter only requires access to: - Motion and orientation sensors: To enable the basic functionality of the meter's movement - Device storage (optional): Only if you choose to save custom meter configurations

These permissions are used solely for app functionality and no data is collected or transmitted.

docs.title: Analytics
docs.text: We do not use any analytics services or tracking tools in our app.

docs.title: Children's Privacy
docs.text: Our app is suitable for users of all ages and does not collect any personal information from children or adults.

docs.title: Changes to This Policy
docs.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

docs.title: Third-Party Services
docs.text: The O'meter does not integrate with any third-party services or APIs.

docs.title: Data Storage
docs.text: All app preferences and custom configurations are stored locally on your device and are never transmitted to external servers.

docs.title: Contact Us
docs.text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: dave@skybendertechnologypartners.com

docs.title: App Store Data Usage
docs.text:
As required by the App Store, we confirm that: - Our app does not collect or transmit any user data - No third-party analytics or advertising frameworks are included - No user tracking or profiling occurs - No data is shared with third parties

This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and operates with complete user privacy.
